TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHasXmlNode

Docs.summary: Enables a class to return an from the current context or position.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `IHasXmlNode` interface provides an interface that enables a class to return an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> from the current context or position. It is implemented by <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> objects that operate over classes that have <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes. For example, if the `XPathNavigator` object is created by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, you can use the <xref:System.Xml.IHasXmlNode.GetNode%2A> method to return the `XmlNode` representing the current position of the navigator.
## Examples The following example uses the `GetNode` method to retrieve and modify the selected node.
[!code-cpp[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/CPP/hasxmlnode.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/CS/hasxmlnode.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/VB/hasxmlnode.vb#1)]
The example uses the file `books.xml` as input.
[!code-xml[IHasXmlNode.GetNode#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/IHasXmlNode.GetNode/XML/books.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode GetNode() cil managed
